snippet: The Jets will most likely allow Geno Smith to throw more than he did last week, and left tackle D’Brickashaw Ferguson will be entrusted with slowing defensive end Everson Griffen.
abstract: Preview of NFL Week 14 matchup between New York Jets and Minnesota Vikings.
lead_paragraph: The Jets will most likely allow Geno Smith to throw more than he did last week, and left tackle D’Brickashaw Ferguson will be entrusted with slowing defensive end Everson Griffen.
